12namespace xdsp::noise {
13
21inline double white() {
22 double noise = 0.0;
23
24#if defined _WINDOWS || defined _WINDLL
25 const double RAND_MAX = 32767.0; // (2^15 - 1)
26
27 noise = (double)rand();
28 noise = noise / RAND_MAX noise = maps::unipolar_to_bipolar(noise);
29#else
30 const double ARC4RANDOM_MAX = 4294967295.0; // (2^32 - 1)
31
32 noise = (double)arc4random();
33 noise = noise / ARC4RANDOM_MAX;
34 noise = lerp::to_bipolar(noise);
35#endif
36
37 return noise;
38}

40} // namespace xdsp::noise

42#endif // NOISE_H
